Record.definition: CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE PROCEDURE "PPM"."PAC_BIL_CM_CLNT_SP" ( RESOURCE_CODE VARCHAR2 , in_clntname IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, in_clntcode IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, match NUMBER , RC1 IN OUT PAC_BIL_CM_CLNT_SPPkg.RCT1) AS arg1 GLOBALPKG.STRING; bill_or_match GLOBALPKG.STRING; COMPANY_NAME GLOBALPKG.STRING; COMPANY_CODE GLOBALPKG.STRING; StoO_selcnt INTEGER; StoO_error INTEGER; StoO_rowcnt INTEGER; StoO_crowcnt INTEGER := 0; StoO_fetchstatus INTEGER := 0; StoO_errmsg GLOBALPKG.STRING; StoO_sqlstatus INTEGER; pos NUMBER(3,0); getname NUMBER(1,0); BEGIN /* Called From: Procedure :- Trigger :- PMD TransactionId :- WMD ActionId :- Modified By :Nitin Modified Date :07/25/01 */ arg1 := null; COMPANY_NAME := RTRIM(in_clntname); COMPANY_CODE := RTRIM(in_clntcode); COMPANY_NAME := COMPANY_NAME || '%'; COMPANY_CODE := COMPANY_CODE || '%'; IF match = 1 THEN bill_or_match := 'M'; ELSE bill_or_match := 'B'; END IF; IF bill_or_match = 'B' THEN BEGIN IF NVL(arg1, 'A') = 'A' THEN OPEN RC1 FOR SELECT clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE, clntsupp.COMPANY_NAME FROM clntsupp WHERE COMPANY_CODE LIKE COMPANY_CODE AND COMPANY_NAME LIKE COMPANY_NAME AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM invoiceheader WHERE invoiceheader.COMPANY_CODE = clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE AND invoiceheader.status = '0' AND invoiceheader.invtype = 'I' ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM projstaff WHERE projstaff.COMPANY_CODE = clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE AND projstaff.billingaccess = 1 AND projstaff.RESOURCE_CODE = RESOURCE_CODE ); ELSE IF INSTR( arg1, '|') > 0 THEN BEGIN IF INSTR( arg1, '~') > 0 THEN getname := 1; ELSE getname := 0; END IF; pos := INSTR( arg1, '|'); arg1 := SUBSTR(arg1, 1, pos - 1); IF getname = 0 THEN BEGIN OPEN RC1 FOR SELECT clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE, clntsupp.COMPANY_NAME FROM clntsupp WHERE COMPANY_CODE LIKE COMPANY_CODE AND COMPANY_NAME LIKE COMPANY_NAME AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM invoiceheader WHERE invoiceheader.COMPANY_CODE = clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE AND invoiceheader.status = '0' AND invoiceheader.invtype = 'I' ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM projstaff WHERE projstaff.COMPANY_CODE = clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE AND projstaff.billingaccess = 1 AND projstaff.RESOURCE_CODE = RESOURCE_CODE ) AND clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE >= arg1 ORDER BY 1 ; END; ELSE BEGIN OPEN RC1 FOR SELECT clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE, clntsupp.COMPANY_NAME FROM clntsupp WHERE COMPANY_CODE LIKE COMPANY_CODE AND COMPANY_NAME LIKE COMPANY_NAME AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM invoiceheader WHERE invoiceheader.COMPANY_CODE = clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE AND invoiceheader.status = '0' AND invoiceheader.invtype = 'I' ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM projstaff WHERE projstaff.COMPANY_CODE = clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE AND projstaff.billingaccess = 1 AND projstaff.RESOURCE_CODE = RESOURCE_CODE ) AND clntsupp.COMPANY_NAME >= arg1 ORDER BY 2 ; END; END IF; END; ELSE OPEN RC1 FOR SELECT clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE, clntsupp.COMPANY_NAME FROM clntsupp WHERE COMPANY_CODE LIKE COMPANY_CODE AND COMPANY_NAME LIKE COMPANY_NAME AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM invoiceheader WHERE invoiceheader.COMPANY_CODE = clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE AND invoiceheader.status = '0' AND invoiceheader.invtype = 'I' ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM projstaff WHERE projstaff.COMPANY_CODE = clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE AND projstaff.billingaccess = 1 AND projstaff.RESOURCE_CODE = RESOURCE_CODE ) AND clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE = arg1; END IF; END IF; END; ELSE BEGIN IF NVL(arg1, '') IS NULL THEN OPEN RC1 FOR SELECT clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE, clntsupp.COMPANY_NAME FROM clntsupp WHERE COMPANY_CODE LIKE COMPANY_CODE AND COMPANY_NAME LIKE COMPANY_NAME AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM invoiceheader WHERE invoiceheader.COMPANY_CODE = clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE AND invoiceheader.status = '9' AND invoiceheader.invtype = 'I' AND SUBSTR(invoiceheader.invoiceno, 1, 5) = 'MATCH' ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM projstaff WHERE projstaff.COMPANY_CODE = clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE AND projstaff.billingaccess = 1 AND projstaff.RESOURCE_CODE = RESOURCE_CODE ); ELSE IF INSTR( arg1, '|') > 0 THEN BEGIN IF INSTR( arg1, '~') > 0 THEN getname := 1; ELSE getname := 0; END IF; pos := INSTR( arg1, '|'); arg1 := SUBSTR(arg1, 1, pos - 1); IF getname = 0 THEN BEGIN OPEN RC1 FOR SELECT clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE, clntsupp.COMPANY_NAME FROM clntsupp WHERE COMPANY_CODE LIKE COMPANY_CODE AND COMPANY_NAME LIKE COMPANY_NAME AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM invoiceheader WHERE invoiceheader.COMPANY_CODE = clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE AND invoiceheader.status = '9' AND invoiceheader.invtype = 'I' AND SUBSTR(invoiceheader.invoiceno, 1, 5) = 'MATCH' ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM projstaff WHERE projstaff.COMPANY_CODE = clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE AND projstaff.billingaccess = 1 AND projstaff.RESOURCE_CODE = RESOURCE_CODE ) AND clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE >= arg1 ORDER BY 1 ; END; ELSE BEGIN OPEN RC1 FOR SELECT clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE, clntsupp.COMPANY_NAME FROM clntsupp WHERE COMPANY_CODE LIKE COMPANY_CODE AND COMPANY_NAME LIKE COMPANY_NAME AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM invoiceheader WHERE invoiceheader.COMPANY_CODE = clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE AND invoiceheader.status = '9' AND invoiceheader.invtype = 'I' AND SUBSTR(invoiceheader.invoiceno, 1, 5) = 'MATCH' ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM projstaff WHERE projstaff.COMPANY_CODE = clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE AND projstaff.billingaccess = 1 AND projstaff.RESOURCE_CODE = RESOURCE_CODE ) AND clntsupp.COMPANY_NAME >= arg1 ORDER BY 2 ; END; END IF; END; ELSE OPEN RC1 FOR SELECT clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE, clntsupp.COMPANY_NAME FROM clntsupp WHERE COMPANY_CODE LIKE COMPANY_CODE AND COMPANY_NAME LIKE COMPANY_NAME AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM invoiceheader WHERE invoiceheader.COMPANY_CODE = clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE AND invoiceheader.status = '9' AND invoiceheader.invtype = 'I' AND SUBSTR(invoiceheader.invoiceno, 1, 5) = 'MATCH' ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM projstaff WHERE projstaff.COMPANY_CODE = clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE AND projstaff.billingaccess = 1 AND projstaff.RESOURCE_CODE = RESOURCE_CODE ) AND clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE = arg1; END IF; END IF; END; END IF; END PAC_BIL_CM_CLNT_SP;
